name: Peasant Pusher
description:
Bored of ruling the kingdom, the mischievous king decided to take tax collecting into his own hands!

Push the peasants into the water without falling in yourself!

Credits
David Haynes - Game Design, Programming
https://twitter.com/denglish_design

Tobias Brunner - Game Design, Art
https://twitter.com/PudgeMeBaby

Controls
W-A-S-D - Movement
Space - Push
M - Mute Music

This game was made for the weekly game jam 142 and had the theme "Mischief".
http://weeklygamejam.com/
